titleStmt.title: A new dialogue between Alice & Betrice, as they met at the market one morning early. To the tune of Mopsaphil. This may be printed, R.P.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Blare, at the Looking-glass on London-bridge.,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing.
Verse: "Alice. Good neighbour whyd'ye look awry? you're grown a wondrous stranger ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
